Hotbeds of Innovation: Latest Advances in the Treatment of Diabetes and Obesity

Date: February 2, 2011
Time: 5:30 - 9:00PM
Location: Foley Hoag Waltham, MA
Info: judy@vitalnow.net

Do you or someone you love struggle with diabetes or obesity? Tonight's panel will review the origins of diabetes and obesity and explain why there is an increase in diabetes and obesity in the Unites States. Why is the average American consuming more food and what are the latest comprehensive treatments in obesity?
Come and learn from a distinguished panel of experts how far we've come from the "standard of care" to state-of-the-art diagnostics and novel medical devices for the treatment of diabetes and obesity.

Moderator:
Kevin M. Dolan, Senior Human Resources Consultant, Harvard Medical School

Panelists:
Jose Alberto Halperin, M.D., Associate Professor of Medicine, Director Laboratory for Translational Research Brigham and Women's Hospital, Harvard Medical School
John Nadai, M.D., Bariatrician, Massachusetts General Hospital
Bill Hartman, Director of Research, Essential, Boston
